bean.read: select id as "id", user_id as "userId", description as "description", creation_date as "creationDate", last_modified as "lastModified" from io_userpost where id = ${this.id}
bean.read-list: select id as "id" from io_postreaction where post_id = ${this.id}
select id as "id" from io_postcomment where post_id = ${this.id}
select id as "id" from io_useraction where post_id = ${this.id}
bean.read: select id as "id" from io_userpost where lower(description) = lower(${this.description})
bean.update: update io_userpost set user_id = ${this.userId}, description = ${this.description}, last_modified = ${this.now()} where id = ${this.id}
bean.create: insert into io_userpost ( [#if this.bean.id??]id,[/#if] user_id, description, creation_date, last_modified ) values ( [#if this.bean.id??]${this.id},[/#if] ${this.userId}, ${this.description}, [#if this.bean.creationDate??]${this.creationDate}[#else]${this.now()}[/#if], [#if this.bean.lastModified??]${this.lastModified}[#else]${this.now()}[/#if] )
